ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors are grateful to all the investigators and the patients for their contribution and commitment to the study. We thank Masafumi Kinoshita, Noboru Tanaka, and Sachiho Kida of JCR Pharmaceuticals for carrying out pharmacokinetic measurements and analyses for the entire study. Project management of the study by Sairei So of JCR Pharmaceuticals is duly appreciated. Special thanks are due to Timothy Minton of Keio University, Tokyo, for his immense editorial help.
